incident_updates.body: Start time : 21/11/2022 03:00 UTC End time : 21/11/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : Public network will be unavailable for rack 24C14 during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Start time : 21/11/2022 03:30 UTC End time : 21/11/2022 07:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Backbone infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on multiple network equipment
Start time : 21/11/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 21/11/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to Perform annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
